name: fastapi-htmx-tailwind
description: FastAPI project with HTMX and Tailwind CSS

scripts.start-server: source sentinel-web/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH=$PWD uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port $(python -c 'from app.config import PORT; print(PORT)')
scripts.test:unit: source sentinel-web/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH=$PWD pyright && PYTHONPATH=$PWD pytest tests/unit -n auto -v
